result.title: speed in programming contests
result.content: I have seen good coders solving first problem in 2-3 minutes.I have been doing practice with virtual contests, i can solve problems upto div2 c but my speed is not increasing. i still need 7 minutes on average for first problem .how do you people solve in 2-3 minutes? Man! i take 2 minutes in just reading the problem :P . If there is a way of practicing please tell me. :) (P.S- I know just doing hardcore practicing wont work, i spent 1 year without any rating increase until i began upsolving in right way :). so if there is a way of practicing...
